comments.raw_text:
Hi all, can someone please shed some light as to when and why this page has changed? We have not made any changes to-date and I assume there are some moving parts with regard to localization.

We'd rather understand what has changed, by whom, and then decide what needs to happen. We are likely not the right assignee for this bug.
comments.text:

comments.raw_text:
And if it's not already clear, I'll provide background:

- BSD has a concept of a layout/wrapper (series of assets)
- each campaign can be assigned a layout/wrapper

It appears the DE campaign is set to the old "Protect the Web" wrapper and not the newer "Join Mozilla"

https://donate.mozilla.org/modules/contribution/admin/page_edit.php?contribution_page_id=18

Let me know if we can clarify further.

comments.raw_text:
From what I understand, there was no decision to revert back to the old style. I don't know who did it. 

>>Seth is there any way this could have happened without an admin changing the settings?
comments.author: cnovak@mozilla.com

comments.creator: cnovak@mozilla.com

comments.text:
>From what I understand, there was no decision to revert back to the old style. I don't know who did it. 

I assumed not. What we or you can do in the meantime is change to the new "Join Mozilla" wrapper and catch any bugs (localization is our only real concern) that may result from this change.

Quick review of steps for everyone's benefit:

- log in to BSD login panel
- browse to Fundraising > Fundraising pages (https://donate.mozilla.org/modules/contribution/admin/page_list.php)
- locate the campaign (Protect The Web DE) and click edit icon
- click the Layout/Wrapper tab and change the dropdown to select "Join Mozilla"

Let me know if we can be of service...

Thanks Devin!
